kl_process_manager_t  process_manager,
uint32_t  max_entries 
)

Allocate a 2d scene container.

Parameters:
container Location to store allocated scene container.
process_manager Proccess manager on which to sign up to advance-time/process-tick.
max_entries Maximum number of objects which can be managed by this container.
Returns:
KL_SUCCESS if successful.

KL_API int kl_raycast_scene_container_2d ( kl_scene_container_2d_t  container,
float *KL_RESTRICT  from_xy,
float *KL_RESTRICT  to_xy,
uint32_t  typemask,
kl_raycast_hit_t *KL_RESTRICT  out_hit 
)

Raycast.

Cast a ray into the scene container and return the hit closest to the start of the ray.

Parameters:
container Scene container into which the ray should be cast.
from_xy Start point of ray.
to_xy End point of ray.
typemask Typemask against which valid hits should be tested.
out_hit kl_raycast_hit_t structure to hold result.
Returns:
-1 if input ray is invalid. 0 if no intersections found. Number of intersections otherwise.
KL_API int kl_reserve_scene_container_2d_id ( kl_scene_container_2d_t  container,
uint32_t *  out_id 
)

Reserve an index in the scene container.

Parameters:
container Scene container from which to reserve an id.
out_id Storage location for id, if reservation is successful.
Returns:
KL_SUCCESS if successful.
